channel.title: Bccanscape 718
channel.description:
Hello RSPS Community,
[size=12pt][font=arial black]I Would Like to say, BCCANSCAPE is finally back up and ready for action. I am looking for trustworthy, and reliable staff members currently, and I also work on the server daily. The only thing that is missing from this server is the most important thing. PLAYERS!!!!. So if you could all be so kind and come give Bccanscape a go. If it is not for you, feel free to leave a recommendation for me so I can make it better and more suitable for more people. Cheers to you who decide to give it a go, and a huge thank you to those of you who decide to stick around. Below are some details of what features are in server currently(only a few will be listed to keep element of surpise :)). Have a good day and I am looking forward to seeing everyone in game. [/font][/size]
SERVER FEATURES:
[ul][li]Grand Exchange 100%(Disabled until we have a fair amount of players)[/li] [li]Fairy Rings 100% (Donor+ Feature)[/li] [li]Donator Zone(Currently Being Worked On)[/li] [li]All Skills Working and Trainable 100%[/li] [li]All Minigames added 100%[/li][/ul]
MORE FEATURES:Youtube Video: [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ET_tQSdBxR0[/youtube]

item.title: Bccanscape 718
item.dc:creator: @xdx52 xdx52
item.description:
@xdx52 wrote:

Hello RSPS Community,

[size=12pt][font=arial black]I Would Like to say, BCCANSCAPE is finally back up and ready for action. I am looking for trustworthy, and reliable staff members currently, and I also work on the server daily. The only thing that is missing from this server is the most important thing. PLAYERS!!!. So if you could all be so kind and come give Bccanscape a go. If it is not for you, feel free to leave a recommendation for me so I can make it better and more suitable for more people. Cheers to you who decide to give it a go, and a huge thank you to those of you who decide to stick around. Below are some details of what features are in server currently(only a few will be listed to keep element of surpise :)). Have a good day and I am looking forward to seeing everyone in game.
[/font][/size]

SERVER FEATURES:

[ul][li]Grand Exchange 100%(Disabled until we have a fair amount of players)[/li]
[li]Fairy Rings 100% (Donor+ Feature)[/li]
[li]Donator Zone(Currently Being Worked On)[/li]
[li]All Skills Working and Trainable 100%[/li]
[li]All Minigames added 100%[/li][/ul]

MORE FEATURES:Youtube Video:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ET_tQSdBxR0[/youtube]
